The skull which encloses the brain is very rigid and hence when the tumors grow inside the brain they put pressure on the skull and can lead serious damages. The 5 year survival rate with a cancerous brain tumor is approximately 34 in men and 36 in women. 826 822 and 827 respectively. Pituitary tumors occur in pituitary gland responsible for growth of the body. DiagnosisAccurate diagnosis should be done for detecting brain tumor to start proper treatment early so as to improve the life expectancy of the patient.
